meanings.definition: To combine or mix genetic material from different sources
meanings.sent1: Scientists recombined DNA from two different organisms to create a new species.
meanings.sent2: The chef recombined various ingredients to make a unique dish.
meanings.sent3: The students recombined their ideas to come up with a creative project.
meanings.sent4: She recombined her favorite songs into a new playlist.
meanings.sent5: The artist recombined colors to form a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: To mix or blend different elements or components together
meanings.sent1: The chemist recombined the chemicals to form a new compound.
meanings.sent2: The DJ recombined different tracks to create a remix.
meanings.sent3: The children recombined their toys to make a unique game.
meanings.sent4: He recombined the puzzle pieces to reveal the hidden picture.
meanings.sent5: The baker recombined ingredients to bake a delicious cake.
